content:

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Aziz. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement. I am open to discussing the rental price with you and finding an agreement that works for both of us. Would you like to propose a rental price?

content:
I would like to propose a rental price of 1000 Euros per month.

I am looking for a good relationship with my landlord, so I am willing to communicate regularly and be open to any suggestions or concerns that you may have.

I hope we can come to an agreement on a rental price that works for both of us.

content:
